__e: 12/Yusuf-50: And the king said: “Bring him to me.” So when the Rasul (messenger) came to him, Joseph said: “Go back to your master and ask him, what the case of the women who cut their hands is. Surely my Lord knows their plot the best.”
- Ah? Get two cars, take the doctor home, - put a guard on his house...
All right, get that gun down this hill till it's a quarter mile from town.
You supply equipment, he supplies paper, right?
You must be responsible of your family, if you bring children take care of them, they should not damage anything
Bring along the horses. We may need them.
Come down by the station in about an hour. Bring your yardmen.
YOU CAN TAKE YOUR FRIENDS CHILDREN AND SMALL CHILDREN, THEY WILL BE WELCOME
Bring your friends, family and anyone else who deserves to know the truth. Groups are welcome.
She's there, I tell you. At the airport. Bring her to the radio at once!
Bring our guests car round to the front.
But you Americans have plenty of everything, so bring the food,
We bring good luck to the planet.
Now, bring a friend! Get the 50% of your share in March
I am told you brought a young man for us.
We could ask your mother to come along, too. Come on.
Well... now that you know you can do it, next time, bring your family.
Don't be late now, and bring your buddy for my girlfriend.
